Title: The Belchies
Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Jon Schroeder, Jim Dauterive (creator), Lizzie Molyneux (story editor), Kelvin Yu (story editor), Scott Jacobson (story editor), Holly Schlesinger (story editor), Wendy Molyneux (story editor), Nora Smith (story editor), Steven Davis (story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: The kids hunt for treasure in an abandoned taffy factory and Bob and Linda must find them before the factory's scheduled demolition.
